name: Little Invaders
description:
This is my first game that I made. It's a very simple shoot'em up that my son can play with it.

In this shooter you must destroy all the enemies until the invasion progress bar was full. If an enemy enter in collision with you or if he cross the bottom of the screen, you loose one life.

Controls

On title screen: 

  • left or right arrow to choose the color of your space ship
  • x/v to start the game

In game:

  • left or right arrow to move your space ship
  • x/v to shoot

On game over screen:

  • c/z to restart the game
